name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc: March 2002
overview: A playable demo disc for the Nintendo GameCube system. Playable games include: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle James Bond 007: Agent Under Fire Bloody Roar: Primal Fury Super Smash Bros. Melee Video previews include: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle James Bond 007: Agent Under Fire Star Fox Adventures Super Smash Bros. Melee a Multi-Game Medley
